review: I've owned the Fire TV Stick for over six months, and it's just ok.  My biggest complaint is that the picture stutters when watching with subtitles on.  I only watch certain shows with subtitles (for example True Detective season 2... just to have a chance at understanding what was happening). The picture then freezes momentarily at least once per second.  When I want to use subtitles, I switch to my older apple TV.  I should not have to do that.The interface is a little unnecessarily complicated.  The categories on the main page contain both individual recent shows, as well as recent apps, all mixed together.  The icons are both square and rectangular.  There is a category called Recent apps, and when you click on an app like Netflix, it displays an information page on the Netflix app containing descriptions and ratings, etc.  Then you click ANOTHER button to open Netflix, why is this necessary? Just open Netflix.Seems a bit over engineered.  However for 30 bucks it's nice to be able to watch Prime content on my TV.
